name: Jaime Boixadós Martínez

experiences.title: Python Engineer
experiences.description: Python developer at Amadeus in the project Traveler ID. Traveler ID digitalizes identity and health document verifications at every stage of the traveler journey. It provides to airlines, airports, hotels, travel agencies and other travel partners the means to perform automatic identification and COVID-19 document verification at any travel checkpoint such as check-in, boarding, airport security etc (source amadeus.com).

experiences.description: During my time at Sofiasquare I worked on a Project of user scoring. The objective was to show the best potential teachers for a particular student.
